bioconda.name: bioconductor-hitc
bioconda.summary: High Throughput Chromosome Conformation Capture analysis

biotools.summary: This package was developed to explore high-throughput 'C' data such as 5C or Hi-C. Dedicated R classes as well as standard methods for quality controls, normalization, visualization, and further analysis are also provided.

bioschemas.name: HiTC
bioschemas.summary: This package was developed to explore high-throughput 'C' data such as 5C or Hi-C. Dedicated R classes as well as standard methods for quality controls, normalization, visualization, and further analysis are also provided.
